column2: ENGLISH
By the Gods! You wake up with a terrible itch somewhere on your body, and when you turn to scratch, it feels like you poked yourself in the eye. You've grown a third eye!!!
Noooo!
*gasp* I'll... pluck it... out!
Over the last couple of days, a part of your body has been growing strange hair... it has gotten worse, and you now have a small patch of fur somewhere on your body!
Noooo!
Your fellows have been telling you lately to take a bath in no uncertain terms, but no matter how much you scrub, the smell just won't go away. A foul mutation is causing you to reek!
Noooo!
Lately your hand has been slowly transforming, and one day, you wake to discover a huge claw where once your hand was! Curses, this is going to be hard to hide...
Noooo!
Oh Gods, I'll need to get the meat cleaver...

It's subtle at first, but you can't deny it any longer - your appearance is slightly turning into that of an animal, whether a cat, dog, cow, or deer... it's not a full transformation, but it's impossible to cover up any longer!
I'll need to go into hiding!
Some part of your body is undergoing serious changes - whether it's your feet turning into hoofs or a shell growing on your back, this is becoming impossible to hide!
I'll need to go into hiding!
Your body is mutating faster and faster, and you are turning into some kind of beast! Your mind is starting to crack under the pressure...
I'll need to go into hiding!
You have been struck by a terrible mutation - your body is literally falling apart and rotting, but it is no normal disease! It won't take long until you are a lump of twisted flesh!
I'll need to go into hiding!

By all the gods... you wake up one morning to hear someone screaming next to you, and turn to find that you have grown a second head which looks at you in horror and screams into your face with foetid breath.
*Turn to the head and scream back* AAHHHHH!!!
After all the mutations, you barely look like your former self. Your body is strangely misshapen and normal people will hate and fear you whenever they find you.
Your mortal body could no longer endure the effects of mutations - you've become a Chaos Spawn - mindless creature in service of the Ruinous Powers.
Mutations are a sign of Chaos, and signs of Chaos must be rooted out with fire and sword! You should probably check this court for signs of mutants while you're here...
Curses! The Witch Hunter at your court has spied on you, and discovered your mutation! This is surely the end, for you...
I will appeal to my liege!

My liege! I must confess... it is true I have been horribly mutated by Chaos, but I do not serve the Ruinous Powers, I swear it! I am an innocent victim - please do not trust the Witch Hunter's accusations!
Unclean abomination, death by fire for you!
Very well, I shall show mercy. But see a surgeon at once!
I will not slay you, but nor will I let you roam free...

You come out of hiding, but your mutations are so advanced that the first courtier who sees you screams and flees in horror shouting for the guards. Soon you are surrounded, but despite your pleas for mercy, one of them stabs you, and the others quickly follow through!
Goodbye, cruel world...
A fellow realm ruler has been killed by his own guards, after he came out of his quarters horribly mutated. It is the topic of gossip all over the realm these days. These are truly terrible times...
Ghrond is held by a Dark Elf.
Ghrond is not held by a Dark Elf.
You show talent for sorcery. Do you want to go to Ghrond and study with the Covens of Morathi?
Yes, I will pursue the study of sorcery!
No, I will remain here.
Your daughter shows talent for magic, and has decided to go to Ghrond and study with the Covens of Morathi. This is a great honour for your house, she will now become a bride of Malekith
A great honour indeed.
A daughter of a noble house shows talent for sorcery, and asks for your permission to be taught amongst the Covens of Ghrond. What do you say?
We will welcome this new apprentice Sorceress.
No, not this one.
The Sorceresses at Ghrond accept your application. You will be trained in Sorcery, and also in the ways of Atharti, Goddess of Pleasure, Patron of Ghrond.
Study Magic
While the realm is at peace, you are free to pursue your studies of magic undisturbed. Do you wish to seclude yourself and dedicate yourself to understanding the mysteries of the Winds of Magic?
Your studies have paid off, and you now understand a little more of the Winds of Magic.
The realm is at war, and you are forced to stop your studies in seclusion and do what you can for its defence.
No, I cannot stop my studies now!
After countless long nights of study, you have now mastered level 2 spells
After countless long nights of study, you have now mastered level 3 spells
After countless long nights of study, you have now mastered level 4 spells, ranking you amongst the great spellcasters of the world.
Spellcasting
The spell has expired and the troops and flag are removed.
For 500 gold, you can hire the services of a Sorceress. She will serve in your armies, and act as your advisor on magical issues.
Hire her
A ruler has offered to rent your services as Sorceress for 500 gold. Do you wish to accept this offer?
Of course, I accept your offer my liege. Rest assured, I will serve you in all ways, and while our contract lasts I will wholly devote myself to your house.
Magic
You show a talent for magic. Do you want to go to Hoeth and study there with the Loremasters?
Yes, I will go to the Loremasters!
No, I do not wish to study magic.
Your child shows talent for magic, and has decided to go to Hoeth and study with the Loremasters. This is a great honour for your house, to have a mage of Ulthuan amongst you.
A great honour indeed.
A scion of a noble house shows talent for magic and asks for your permission to be taught amongst the Loremasters of Hoeth. What do you say?
We will welcome this new apprentice.
No, not this one.
The Loremasters have accepted your application, and they bid you seek the Tower and study its mysteries in defence of the people of Ulthuan.
You show a talent for magic, but you cannot leave your responsibilities to your lands behind. Perhaps if you paid money, you could get the materials required to build a magical lab here...
Yes, I will build a lab and study magic!
No, I do not wish to study magic.

Your child shows talent for magic, and has decided to build a lab at home and study, while still maintaining the responsibilities of rulership. This is a great honour for your house, to have a mage of Ulthuan amongst you.
A great honour indeed.
A landed ruler of Ulthuan has decided to take up the study of magic independently, but informs you that any aid the White Tower can provide would be most welcome.
I will not be responsible for any mishaps...
Your natural abilities seem to run towards magic. Training will be expensive, but perhaps for 100 gold you could get started on building a magical lab and hiring someone to teach you.
Your child shows talent for magic, and has decided to build a lab at home and study under a tutor. This is a great honour for your house, to have an Ice Mage or Witch amongst you.
You hear that one of your vassals has taken up the study of Ice Magic. This is a great thing, and can only strengthen your realm.
Yes, magic can help protect us against our enemies.
You iz becoming weird as youz mates say... but maybe you iz just becoming mo' powerful! Do you want to start studying the deeper mysteries of Gork and Mork?
I will get da power!
Nah, I just likes to use my smasher!
One of your boyz is becoming decidedly weird... he has starting casting magical spells, and chanting and dancing oddly!
Dats my boy!
One of your chiefs has become a Shaman, and is said to have been granted strange powers by Gork and Mork.
Dat him? He iz gonna fight and smash our enemies for us!

You are the ruler of Bretonnia, but you are not a Grail Knight. Convention demands that only a Grail Knight may rule, so you must either go on the quest and become a Grail Knight within 5 years, or abdicate the throne.
Your natural abilities seem to run towards magic. Training will be expensive, but perhaps for 100 gold you could get started on building a magical lab and hiring someone to teach you.
Your child has been blessed by the Gods, and has developed strange powers. The path of the Chaos Sorcerer is in its future for certain...
The Gods bless our family!
News are spreading throughout your court that one of your vassals has been blessed by the Gods, and wields their power through dark sorcery.
The Gods bless my realm. I am pleased.
Crafting Menu
Crafting Menu - Amulets
Crafting Menu - Potions
Crafting Menu - Rings
Crafting Menu - Swords
Using gold it is possible to craft powerful magical tools to aid you. What do you wish to craft?
Using gold it is possible to craft powerful magical tools to aid you. What do you wish to craft?
Depending on your magic power and amount of gold, these are the swords you can forge at the moment.
Depending on your magic power and amount of gold, these are the swords you can forge at the moment.
Depending on your magic power and amount of gold, these are the amulets you can forge at the moment.
A potion can be crafted which will last you throughout your lifetime, but not be passed on to your successors. These are the potions you can craft with your level and gold.
These are the rings which you can craft based on your current magic level and available gold.
These are the rings which you can craft based on your current magic level and available gold.
Elixir of Eternal Youth / Takes 10 years.
Potion of Beauty / Takes 1 year.
Amulet of Protection +5 / Takes 5 years.
Amulet of Protection +3 / Takes 3 years.
Ring of Speed / Takes 3 years.
Ring of Invisibility / Takes 1 year.
A Sword of Destruction / Takes 5 years.
A Sword of Ice / Takes 2 years.
A Sword of Fire / Takes 3 years.
Never mind
Show more options
Potion of Healing / Takes 1 year.
A Sword of Lightning / Takes 4 years.
A Runesword / Takes 1 year.
Amulet of Protection +1 / Takes 1 year.
Show more options/Close Menu
I will create a magic ring.
Show more options/Leave Menu
I will make a potion.
I will forge a sword.
I will create an amulet.
Transfer Amulets
Transfer Item
Transfer Swords.
Transfer Rings.
Excellent
Your work is complete
You hold in your hands a glowing runeblade! It shall become an heirloom of your house, and neither mortal nor daemon shall be able to escape its sharp bite...
You hold in your hands a shining blade which has a palpable aura of frost. At will it can project a great spray of ice to the dismay of your enemies. It is both light and impossibly sharp.
You hold in your hands a shining blade which burns with a bright flame. It is both light and impossibly sharp.
You hold in your hands a shining blade which glows with lightning. It can slice through steel as if it were leather, and can call forth lightning bolts in battle.
You hold in your hands a sword which is sure to go down in legend - it practically sings with contained power, and its destruction can be unleashed to terrible effect in battle...

You have created an amulet of minor protection. It will protect both your person, and for short periods of time its range can be extended on the battlefield to deflect hostile arrows from your forces.
You have created an amulet of protection. It will protect your person, and for short periods of time its range can be extended on the battlefield to deflect hostile arrows from your forces.
You have created an amulet of great protection. It will protect your person, and for short periods of time its range can be extended on the battlefield to deflect hostile arrows from your forces.
You have created a healing potion, which can cure all wounds and deformities. Once spent, however, it will disappear.
You have created a potion of beauty. It will spoil quickly if you wait at all, so you drink deeply, and already you feel yourself becoming the ideal of beauty!
You have created an elixir of eternal youth. The power of the potion is tied to your own essence, and it cannot be used by anyone but yourself.
You have created a ring of persuasion. Using a subtle combination of charm magic and increased sensitivity to the flow of a conversation, it is a powerful tool in all negotiations.
You have created a ring of invisibility. Obviously, this will have huge benefits for your intrigue.
You have created a ring of speed. Not only can it make you move with uncanny speed, during times of war its influence can be extended to an entire army making them all move 10% faster.
You have created a ring of command. During battles, its influence can be extended to your entire army, making them both attack and defend with more courage.
Theft
One or more of your prisoners have magic items of great power. Do you want to simply steal these items from them and claim them as your own?
Of course

Upon getting imprisoned, your gear was taken from you. One day, the jailer cruelly informs you that his lord has seized all your magical items as his own. Laughing, he tells you that your life might be the next item to be revoked.
Bastards!!!

If you have magic items, you can transfer them to any realm character. Just be sure that they have the minor title 'Item Transfer Target'. Be warned: If you choose to transfer a sword for example, all swords will be transferred.
Gift Recipient
Ring of Persuasion / Takes 1 Year
Ring of Command / Takes 5 Years
As a member of the Amazon people, your succession must be enatic. Males cannot be allowed to threaten the ruling order by holding independent power.
One or more males are running around freely in your court. This cannot be allowed to stand. They must be sent to the guarded male dorms immediately and put to good use!
Yes, immediately!
You have walked as a free man amongst the Amazons, but no more. A group of spear maidens seize you, and on orders of their mistress, drag you to the dungeons where a new life of slavery awaits you.
Nooo!
You have given birth to a male child. By the laws of your people, he must either be prepared for sacrifice, or slavery.
He will be sent to the dungeons and be a slave.
This one will be sacrificed.
I *am* the law! My sons will live free amongst us.
The Empire is fragmented, but you are both renowned and pious enough that both the nobles and clergy might flock to you. Do you wish to publicize your claim to the throne?
Yes, immediately!
No, not yet...

Word quickly spreads - has a child of the Empire finally become a worthy heir to Sigmar? From early reports, the peasants and clergy are supporting your claim, now you must await word from the Elector Counts and other lords...
This person, loved and respected by both the peasants and clergy, has made a push for end of division and for the Empire to unite around their person. Do you support their claim?
Yes, let the division end.
No, I'll never bend the knee to this usurper!
You have sworn to serve the new Emperor, and therefore, your contender title must be destroyed.
My liege - I ask you to forgive my part in the recent troubles, and pray that a new era of unity and glory awaits us under your wise leadership.
Well said. Let all old divisions be settled.
You have announced your rejection of this false new Emperor, but some of your vassals are not pleased...
Bah, let them grumble!
I would rather see the Empire fall into ruin than bend the knee to you! I shall see you on the battlefield, foul usurper.
Traitor!

Whether through war or just the slow passage of time, the population in this province has fallen. Such is the fate of all elves in Ulthuan, to slowly diminish, but they will never yield to their enemies even so.

Whether through war or just the slow passage of time, the population in this province is now moderately depopulated. Empty villages and mansions dot the country side, their former inhabitants now only a distant memory.

Whether through war or just the slow passage of time, the population in this province is now heavily depopulated. The lords there struggle to maintain a semblance of civilization, and many areas are now devoid of elves entirely, given over to nature and the wild beasts.

Whether through war or just the slow passage of time, the population in this province is now severely depopulated. The major noble families still maintain their mansions and the immediate surrounds, but they have lost the ability to control much more than that.
This province is occupied by enemies and many precious elven lives have been lost.
How do I summon a daemonic host and wreak havoc on the world?
Openly turn to Chaos, and summon a daemonic host!

To be worthy of the Blood God's attentions you must be a be a High-Magus of Khorne. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you depending on how strong the Winds of Chaos are.
Do you wish to openly serve Khorne, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD!!!
No, now is not the opportune time...

This ruler has been a secret servant of the Ruinous Powers for some time now, and has finally proclaimed his allegiance. He or she has summoned a daemonic army and is preparing to wage a war of conquest!
By the gods...!
How do I summon a daemonic host and wreak havoc on the world?
Openly turn to Chaos, and summon a daemonic host!

To be worthy of the Grandfather Nurgle's attentions, the Winds of Chaos must be strong and you must be a be a High-Magus of Nurgle. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you.
Do you wish to openly serve Nurgle, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
FLIES FOR THE PLAGUE LORD!

To be worthy of the Prince of Pleasure's attentions, the Winds of Chaos must be strong and you must be a be a High-Magus of Slaanesh. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you.
Do you wish to openly serve Slaanesh, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
ALL PRAISE SLAANESH!
No, now is not the opportune time...

To be worthy of the Lord of Change's attentions, the Winds of Chaos must be strong and you must be a be a High-Magus of Tzeentch. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you.
Do you wish to openly serve Tzeentch, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
ALL MUST SERVE THE ARCHITECT OF FATE!

To be worthy of the Chaos Gods attentions, the Winds of Chaos must be strong and you must be a be a High-Magus of the Dark Gods. Hold a grand rite or donate to the cult's coffers, and in time, he will bless you with his power and send armies to aid you.
Do you wish to openly serve the Chaos Gods, and enact a ritual that will open a portal to the Realm of Chaos? (Be warned: There is no going back from this choice, once made)
THE WORLD SHALL FALL!
There are known worshippers of Chaos in the realm... these must be rooted out with fire, steel, and cannon if need be!
My liege, there are known followers of the Ruinous Powers infesting your realm! These must be hunted down at once. Will you give the temple the authority to cleanse the land of this foul taint?

Your top liege has ordered that open Chaos followers in the realm be exterminated - temple armies led by Witch Hunters approach with fire and steel, but due to your skills you manage to escape them alive!
Your top liege has ordered that open Chaos followers in the realm be exterminated and temple armies led by Witch Hunters approach with fire and steel. You try to run, but they manage to corner you!
Do not bother me with this again
No, let these ones keep roaming free

Once each spring, it is allowed for all Amazons of any caste to mate with men so that new daughters can be born. Do you wish to host a fertility ritual, and put your captive male population to good use?
Yes, let the ritual be prepared!
No, maybe next year...

Rigg, Goddess of War and Battle does not normally tolerate men in her realm, but tonight her sister Serena will allow an exception. The drums beat, the pace of the dance increases, and as the wine flows, your ceremonial husband for one night is brought before you in chains along with many others for your gathered sisters. You may do as you wish with him and if he does not please you, the Snake-Goddess Serena will welcome his sacrifice after he has performed his final duty for the Amazon Sisterhood!
Come with me, slave...

While lying in the prison cell you hear the drums beat, the pace of the dance increases, the laughter upstairs in the palace grow increasingly wild as the wine no doubt flows. Fierce Amazon spearmaidens soon arrive to put you in chains and drag up to the hall along with the others. You are soon brought before an Amazon Priestess, and she leads you towards her private quarters... you have heard rumours that men who displease them during the fertility rites are sacrificed, so your heart is pumping out of your chest...
Must ... not... disappoint her!

You wake up with a smile on your face, sighing contentedly. The slave performed well last night, and you are inclined to let him live on. Yet on the other hand, Serena favours those who sacrifice in her name... especially things they place value on.
Another time perhaps. For now, this one lives.
A life for a life, Serena will have his blood!
You wake up with a sneer awoken by the slave's snoring, still tied to your bed. You remember his pathetic performance last night, and the blood lust begins to boil in your veins...
No, I'm going to be merciful.
At least I'll enjoy sacrificing this one, and hearing his screams.
You wake up tied to the Priestess's bed, and find her smiling down on you. 'Good slave,' she whispers, 'I hope the others let you live too, and I get you next year as well...'
Thank the gods, I'm going to live!

You wake up tied to the Priestess's bed, and find her sneering face looking down on you. Without a word, you are knocked unconscious by the hilt of a wicked looking dagger and when you come to... you are in the great hall, kneeling before the high priestess. Drums are beating, your head is pounding, Amazons are dancing and cheering behind you, and then a sharp cold pain is felt against your throat. You have no time to scream as the last things you see is a spray of blood pouring out on the ground from your throat!
Ugghhhh!!!

The sacrifices to Serena are brought before the throne. These men have proven themselves worthless. The drums are beating, your sisters are dancing around them, and cheers emanate from the sides of the great hall. Finally you step down behind the slave you bedded last night, savour the look of terror on his face, and then swiftly draw the sacrificial dagger as you move behind him and spray his lifeblood all over the floor. The Creators be praised, let this sacrifice please the Snake-Goddess!
Serena be praised!
In the eyes of the world, your child is a bastard, but in Amazon culture that is not so. Your child is your legitimate heir, no matter who the father is.
That is the proper way of things.
You have been told previously that you are an exception, and do not have to be a slave in the Amazon hierarchy. Yet you find yourself in prison along with the others...
I will appeal to my jailers!

You are asked to visit one of your captives in the dungeon. He looks at you appealingly: 'Please, I was promised that I was an exception and could roam freely... why am I locked up here with all the others?
Ahh, that is correct my pet. Sisters, release this one!
We lied. You will stay where you belong.
Your host comes down to your cell, and smiles at your predicament. 'You're right, pet, we did say you could walk freely. Sisters - release this one at once!'
Thank you!

Your host comes down to your cell, and smiles at your predicament. 'Remember when we said that you could walk freely amongst us? We lied.' With that, the Amazons laugh darkly and leave you alone once more.
Wait, please, come back!
Your top liege is an Amazon, and in Amazon realms men are forbidden from holding or inheriting titles unless they are a very rare exception.
Curse this unjust and purely socially constructed order!
Your top liege is no longer Amazon, so you can now inherit normally again.
Gender equality at last!
Lahmians

You are the Queen of the Lahmians. Your ancient kingdom of Lahmia in Nehekhara was taken from you, but its glories of old can still be restored. Using stealth, cunning, and seduction you can mould the world of men to serve your purposes. Send your daughters into the world, have them infiltrate the corridors of power, and when the time is right - have your mortal puppets dance to the tune that you play for them. Seduce the weak mortals to become your slaves and then one day you shall lead a great army to retake Lahmia and you shall live forever as its queen, with nothing in the world being denied to you.
So let it be written, so let it be done!
You have decided to seduce this target personally. He will have no choice but to ultimately become your slave, and do all that you require of him...
I'll need to pack... slaves! Ready my baggage-train!

You have chosen this man to focus your efforts on. You will have to send one of your dynasty to accomplish the task, only they are skilled enough to even attempt to seduce a powerful man like this. (Note: Wait a week between each assignment)
I will send this one
I will send an elite member of the Sisterhood
Your mother has instructed you to seduce a target, and bend him to the will of the Sisterhood. You must leave immediately.
I shall pack my best outfits, perfumes, and jewels immediately, my Queen.
You are in the lands of your target. Now... what shall we do...
I will play the damsel in distress...
I will host a lavish ball, as the rich new heiress in town
With his wife dead, he will need some comforting...
I will host a lavish ball, as the rich new heiress in town
Your daughter sends word - she has reached her destination safely, and will begin infiltrating the court as ordered and bend its ruler to your will.
Mmm... good.
One morning while falconing, you hear a lady scream in the distance. She sounds like she is in serious trouble! You look around, and your companions are nowhere to be seen. What do you do?
I shall rescue the lady!
If she's in trouble, I could be in danger. Ride for home at once!

You hear your target is going falconing, and have had your handmaidens ensure that his companions would be... distracted. Once you see him alone in the distance, you give the signal, and three hired ruffians pretend to attack you as you let out an ear-piercing scream of terror! Just as expected, your target comes riding full force with his sword drawn just when the ruffians throw you to the ground. Seeing him, they scatter in all directions, and he jumps off his horse, asking if you are unhurt.
Oh, my brave lord! You saved my life!

You hear your target is going falconing, and have had your handmaidens ensure that his companions would be... distracted. Once you see him alone in the distance, you give the signal, and three hired ruffians pretend to attack you as you let out an ear-piercing scream of terror! You see your intended staring, hesitating, even as the ruffians throw you to the ground and act like they are about to take you. Then the coward turns and rides away at full speed! Useless, weak, and thrice-cursed mortal fool!
*hiss* I'll need time to come up with a new plan...

As you rush towards them with your sword drawn, the ruffians quickly scatter. The lady is beautiful, and judging from her torn clothes and jewels, very rich. She thanks you profusely, and you escort her back to the city. Upon arrival she takes her leave, but promises that she will repay you for your gallantry.
What a stunning beauty. I'm a hero for saving her!
A Great Ball

You play the part of the noble damsel in distress perfectly, allowing him to see himself as your saviour and protector as he escorts you back to the city. Upon arriving at the market, you take your leave, but promise to reward him for his virtue.
Now I will invite him to a ball...
I should get rid of his wife first...
I'll sneak into his room at night...
Unfortunately, this game ends. I must return home.

Word around the city is that a rich heiress is hosting a magnificent gala, and of course your invitation arrived just this morning in gold-stamped letters. Rumours say that she is as beautiful as she is rich. Do you want to attend?
Why yes, of course! Next Friday? Certainly.
Oh, it's the lady I saved while falconing! Of course I'll attend.
No, I have no interest in balls or heiresses

Tonight is the night of the ball you are hosting. Everything has been prepared to an exquisite detail, and you are the centre of attention and envy in the room. Finally, your prize guest arrives and the evening proceeds down to the minutest detail of your desires. The music is playing, the nobles are dancing, and the wine flows. You dance with your guest of honour, and work your arts of seduction on him subtly. As the evening draws to a close, it is time to make your move...
Whisper in his ear and suggest he stay the night.
Poison his wife, his grief will make him vulnerable.

Tonight is the night of the grand gala. You arrive to a splendid mansion and are greeted by the beautiful - and obviously fabulously wealthy - heiress. As the wine flows and the music plays, you find your eyes inexplicably drawn towards her, and you often find her smiling seductively back at you from across the room. As the evening draws to a close, the last dance is called, and she glides over and takes you to the floor. After a flawlessly executed dance, she whispers hotly in your ear 'Care to stay the night, my lord?'
*whisper back* I'll return when the guests have left...
But... I'm married! I can't!
No, that would not be proper, my lady. Good night.
Lovers
Seduction
Grief

You seduce your target into a night of wild passion, and as dawn is about to break, you know that for the moment at least - he is under your spell. While he remains so, you can use your influence once a year to get him to send you expensive gifts, or even troops on some pretext that your distant family lands are under threat from greenskins or even other vampires. Should you leave him to return to your own lands, however, your hold over him will be lost.

You seduce your target into a night of wild passion, and as dawn is about to break, you know that for the moment at least - he is under your spell. While he remains so, you can use your influence once a year to get him to send you expensive gifts, or even troops on some pretext that your distant family lands are under threat from greenskins or even other vampires. You will then pass these on to your queen, to further the cause of restoring ancient Lahmia to the sisterhood. Should you leave him to return to your own lands, however, your hold over him will be lost.
I knew he would not resist me.

You have spent a night of wild passion with this beautiful and mysterious lady, and you are certain that you'll be seeing more of her in the months and years to come. You have scratch and bite marks all over your body, and though it hurts to get dressed, you leave with a smile on your face.
Until next time, mysterious lady.
Cruel fate! Your wife suddenly took ill, and died screaming in the night. It happened so soon... but the doctors could find no trace of poison, and who would have any motive?
Why, gods, why?!
These are perilous times...

Hah! The mark's wife died 'suddenly and tragically'... what a shame... and from my spies in the court, no one knows why. Those servant boys I seduced did very well indeed. That's one obstacle removed. Now... to proceed with the plan...
Yes, what shall be the next step?
A plot to poison your wife has been revealed! When put to the question, the servants who were caught with the poison revealed everything - a beautiful rich heiress seduced them to do the dark deed...
I want this 'heiress' seized and executed!

Damnations! Those foolish servant boys you seduced got themselves caught trying to poison your target's wife, and your sources in the court say that they spoke your name. This cat and mouse game is over. Time to flee.
I only hope my mistress will forgive my failure.
I can't believe I failed...
Cruel fate! As you wake up the next day, your wife lies dead next to you. It happened so soon and so quietly... but the doctors could find no trace of poison, and who would have any motive?
Curses! Why gods, why?!
These are perilous times...

You manage to dump poison from your ring into the cup of your target's wife, just as the final toast is made. From reports, she died quietly in her sleep in the night, and the cause remains a mystery. That's one obstacle removed. Now... to proceed with the plan...
Yes, what shall be the next step?
Your wife has been poisoned, but due to the quick actions of a priest she was saved in time! It must have happened during the feast...
I want all who attended questioned immediately!

Damnations! Your sources inside the court reveal to you that the place is in an uproar. Her life was saved by a holy priest, but they are going to conduct a thorough investigation of everyone who attended the feast. As a vampire, you cannot pass such close examination... This cat and mouse game is over. Time to flee.
I only hope my mistress will forgive my failure.
I can't believe I failed...

The shock of your wife's death still haunts you, but your new lady acquaintance has been a great help and comfort. You find yourself thinking about her all the time. Perhaps, it would not be wrong to let this go a little further?
Yes, surely it was meant to be!
No. There is something 'off' about her...

You have played the role of a trusted friend to your mark since his wife's death, and one night after a lot of wine he moves in to kiss you. Hah - your skills of seduction are as strong as ever, he never had a chance...
All men are weak, if you only know which buttons to push.

Despite trying your best to seduce your mark, it seems you have failed! He is no longer answering your letters, and the guards at the gates will not admit you to his presence any more. It seems you must return home and give up on this chase...
Curses

Your mark refuses to take the bait, and has sent word that he will not attend your ball. Your attempts to get in further contact with him have all failed. It seems you must give up on this chase... it's time to return home.
Curses!

Your mark looks at you with shock when you offer him to stay the night, and coldly informs you that that would not be proper. He leaves in a hurry, and all attempts at further contact fails. It seems this chase is over... it's time to return home.
Curses!
Your mark is dead. It's time to go home.

You have continued to infiltrate the layers of high society around your mark, hosting lavish midnight balls and creating your own network of spies where your handmaidens manipulate and seduce the lesser actors in this game while you set the tune to which they dance. Your mark is in the palm of your hand, he will not refuse you anything. What shall you ask for? Perhaps your funds are tied up in a business venture and you need some gold to maintain your lifestyle? Or perhaps your dear fictional friend or relative has lands under threat, and could use some soldiers to help her out?
I must return home.
Manipulate him into giving you gold
Manipulate him into giving you troops

While attending one of her lavish midnight balls, your dear friend, looking stunning as ever, asks to speak to you privately. She looks distraught and on the verge of tears. It seems her steward has tied her money up in a risky business venture, and she fears she cannot maintain her estate at all if she cannot find the funds elsewhere. She would be humiliated, thrown out of her home, and forced to live like a commoner. She looks at you appealingly, and asks if you can do anything to help her out of her predicament?
My dear lady, let it trouble you no longer. I will help.
No, I won't help with money.
Your benefactor agrees to support your lifestyle with his own funds until yours are once more liquid, and you make sure he is well rewarded for his generosity.
This game continues to delight! Now I'll send these to my queen.
This game continues to delight!

Your dear lady friend is delighted, and you are richly rewarded for your generosity over the coming days and weeks. You are pleased with yourself, as the city would be such a dull place without her stunning beauty, lavish parties and clever wit. She really is the centre of high society in many ways.
I couldn't let such a noble lady live like a commoner...
Curses! Your mark is apparently not so easily manipulated... he refuses to help you with money, which makes him useless to you. All this work wasted... it is time to return home.
That arrogant mortal, I should rip his throat out...
You refuse to help out the heiress with money, and despite her pleas, you leave the ball without helping her. The next day, you are informed that she has packed up and left the city.
Shame. I think I'll miss her.

While attending one of her lavish balls, your dear friend, looking stunning as ever, asks to speak to you privately. She looks distraught and on the verge of tears. It seems a dear elderly aunt has lands that are under threat, and she doesn't know what to do to help. She looks at you appealingly, and asks that if you are powerful enough to send some troops to her aid?
I will outfit an expedition immediately to clear her lands!
No, I won't help with troops.
Your benefactor agrees to send troops to your endangered relative, and you make sure he is well rewarded for his generosity.
This game continues to delight! Now I'll send these to my queen.
This game continues to delight!

Your dear lady friend is delighted, and you are richly rewarded for your generosity over the coming days and weeks. You are pleased with yourself, as the city would be such a dull place without her stunning beauty, lavish parties and clever wit. She really is the centre of high society in many ways.
I couldn't let such a noble lady be distraught
Curses! Your mark is apparently not so easily manipulated... he refuses to help you with troops, which makes him useless to you. All this work wasted... it is time to return home.
That arrogant mortal, I should rip his throat out...
You refuse to help out the heiress with troops, and despite her pleas, you leave the ball without helping her. The next day, you are informed that she has packed up and left the city.
Shame. I think I'll miss her.
My Queen, I have failed you. The mark resisted attempts at seduction, and would be of no help in gaining us either gold or troops.
Failure is not an option, my dear...
You disappoint me, dear daughter
My Queen, the mark has died. There is nothing more for me to do here... I shall return home immediately.
These mortals... such frail and brief lives...
My Queen, I send you these gifts. I succeeded in manipulating my mark into giving me some gold to maintain my lifestyle.
Well done, daughter.
Well done, daughter. Return home when you are able.

My Queen, I send you these troops. I succeeded in manipulating my mark into giving me some to protect my dear elderly relative... I trust you will soon have them turned into loyal servants of the sisterhood shortly after they arrive.
Well done, daughter. We look forward to breaking them in.
Well done, daughter. Return home when you are able.

One night alone with your lover she smiles darkly at you, revealing sharp fangs, and grasps you with supernatural strength to prevent you from running. She is a vampire! Who could have possibly predicted this turn of events? She wants you to come with her to the Lahmian Court, where you may be granted life eternal, and great power... do you dare refuse?
Never!
Eternal life and power you say? Why of course, my love...

One night alone with your mortal plaything you smile darkly at him, revealing sharp fangs, and pin him down to prevent him from running. You ask him to join you at the Lahmian Court, where he may be granted life eternal, and great power... after the shock subsides, you see that he will do as instructed. The promise of power and an eternity of delights has swayed his weak mind, and you can now do with him as you wish. His bizarre disappearance means he is disinherited from his family forever now, but if he has any claims, you can press them forcefully in war if you so desire.
Excellent...

One night alone with your mortal plaything you smile darkly at him, revealing sharp fangs, and pin him down to prevent him from running. You ask him to join you at the Lahmian Court, where he may be granted life eternal, and great power... after the shock subsides, you see that he will not do as instructed. He tries to pull away from you and screams for the guards - what do you do?
Attack him!
*hiss* Weak fool! *jump out the window and make a run for it*
You think you have found a mark... she is reputedly both beautiful and highly skilled in the arts of intrigue. She might make a fine addition to the sisterhood. Shall you seek her out?
Yes, by all means
doesnt really matter, only for unlanded AIs. But she gets the offer to join the lahmians, thats the gist
Yes
No

Through a mixture of seduction, intimidation, and just perfectly set up circumstances, you convince your mark to accept the blood kiss and join the Lahmian sisterhood. Your queen will be very pleased...

Despite your best efforts, you fail at getting close enough to your mark to give her the blood kiss. Curses! All that time wasted... but she was too well guarded, there was no sense in risking your life just to turn her.
There will be other marks...
Your [GetFromRelation] has run off it seems, leaving her home and family. Why would she do something like this, what could have possibly enticed her to give up everything she had?
Scandalous... she is cut off!
Poor girl, she had so much potential.

One day you wake up alone, with a note on your wife's pillow. It coldly informs you that she is leaving you, and that she does not want you to look for her or think of her any more. 'All we have is dead, as I am dead. Marry another.', it ends with.
Thrice cursed harlot! She has humiliated me!
My Queen, I have sired a new Lahmian progeny. She is both beautiful and highly skilled. I trust that she will make us proud, and serve the sisterhood well.
Well done. You are a good minion.

One of your holdings in the realms of men has sent you their bi-annual profits. Whether from prostitution, blackmail, assassinations or simple corrupt business deals, they have managed to turn a tidy profit it seems.
Well done, sisters.
Do not bother me with this again. Just send the cash.
There have been strange things happening in this province. The temple suspects a hidden group of vampires, and these must be rooted out with fire and sword.
Our faith will prevail!
No, it's probably nothing...
You have survived the efforts of the vampires to stop you, and now that you know they are here, the infestation is rooted out with fire, stakes, and cold silver.
Our faith prevails again!
One of your holdings has been destroyed by the Witch Hunters. Perhaps it is time to appoint some better protectors? It is their job to prevent these things from happening!
Curses!
Do not bother me with such bad news again!
Your top liege is a servant of the gods, and will not tolerate you in his realm. It is better to flee now, rather than to risk destruction at the hands of the Witch Hunters...
Agreed, I must leave at once!

A foolish mortal has tried to seduce you. It was entertaining for a while, but as your desire grows, so does your hunger. One night you can barely restrain yourself from taking your fill of their blood - perhaps it is time to end this little game?
Yes, I must sate my thirst! *attack your lover*
No, I will show restraint...

You have foolishly decided to take a vampire for your lover. One night, as the passion runs high, a feral look comes over your lover. Sharp fangs snap out and clawed hands hold you down with bestial strength - then all you feel is pain as you are brutally mauled and drained of blood.
Oh gods, wait! Nooo - not there!!! Get off me!

You have foolishly decided to take a vampire for your lover. One night, as the passion runs high, a feral look comes over your lover. Sharp fangs snap out and clawed hands hold you down with supernatural strength - then your lover smiles down at you, satisfied for the moment. 'No, you get to live another night...'
That's it - I'm done with this vampire!
You had me worried there for a second...

You feed greedily on your lover, but at the last moment, show some restraint. The pulse is weak, the body is mauled, but somehow, still breathing. You decide to let them live, if they can recover, and tell your minions to take this one back home in their carriage.
No sense completely draining good cattle, I always say.

A non-believer has tried to seduce you. It was entertaining for a while, but the more time passes, the more you want them to embrace the true powers of the void. Perhaps it is time to bestow some of grandfather Nurgle's gifts on them?
Yes, feel the embrace of Grandfather Nurgle, my love...
No, I will show restraint...

You have foolishly decided to take a follower of the Ruinous Powers for your lover. One morning you wake up feeling dizzy and nauseous, and your paramour smiles down at you. 'I have given you a gift... do you like it?'
*coughs up blood* That's it - we are DONE!
I... I do kind of like it...

A non-believer has tried to seduce you. It was entertaining for a while, but the more time passes, the more you want them to embrace the true powers of the void. Perhaps it is time to show them some of the true pleasures that Slaanesh has to offer?
Yes, feel the embrace of Slaanesh, lover...

You have foolishly decided to take a follower of the Ruinous Powers for your lover. One morning you wake up, and as your body burns with pain, you realize that last night was not a nightmare. You are covered in wounds and as you remember tortured fragments of last night's events your lover merely smiles down at you. 'Did you enjoy it, my love?'
That's it, we are DONE!
I... I think I did...

A non-believer has tried to seduce you. It was entertaining for a while, but the more time passes, the more you want them to embrace the true powers of the void. Perhaps it is time to see if they are worthy of the Blood God's favour?
Yes, a test is in order.

You have foolishly decided to take a follower of the Ruinous Powers for your lover. One day while walking in the woods with your lover, a huge knight approaches, radiating a palpable aura of evil. Your lover smiles. 'Today is the day you must prove yourself to Khorne, my love..."
That's it, we are DONE! *run away as fast as possible*
Yes... at last. Blood for the Blood God!

A non-believer has tried to seduce you. It was entertaining for a while, but the more time passes, the more you want them to embrace the true powers of the void. Perhaps it is time to see how they deal with the Tzeentch's gifts?
Yes, some warpdust in their wine perhaps...

You have foolishly decided to take a follower of the Ruinous Powers for your lover. One night after drinking some strange-tasting wine, you wake in the middle of the night to terrible pain as your body transforms. Your lover smiles down at you - 'Do not be afraid, this is a gift, a wonderful, wonderful gift...'
*scream in horror as you feel the mutation* That's it, we are DONE!
I... I will embrace the change!
No, our passion shall be eternal!
